Title: Identification
Description: Identification refers to the decision to develop a project within the budget and programme of a project owner (the public entity responsible for executing the budget).

Title: Preparation
Description: Preparation covers the feasibility study, environmental and social impact assessment, general scoping of the project, establishing the packaging and procurement strategy, preliminary statutory requirements on environmental and land impacts, and the resulting budget authorisation.

Title: construction
Description: Project implementation covers the procurement and implementation of the group of works or services to be delivered under the project, including works or services performed by the procuring entity.

Title: Completion
Description: Completion covers the handover of the assets and close-out activities with details of the final scope, cost, and delivery time.

Title: Completed
Description: Close-out activities were completed, and this project is inactive.

Title: Cancelled
Description: This project was cancelled before close-out activities were completed, and is inactive. Cancellation can occur anytime after identification.
